title: BRIEF-AU Small Finance Bank Ltd Reports Rise in Sept Quarter Net Profit
text:
BRIEF-AU Small Finance Bank Ltd Reports Rise in Sept Quarter Net Profit

Stock Markets 35 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 20:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-AU Small Finance Bank Ltd Reports Rise in Sept Quarter Net Profit Oct 21 (Reuters) - AU Small Finance Bank Ltd : * AU SMALL FINANCE BANK LTD SAYS APPROVED REAPPOINTMENT OF SANJAY AGARWAL AS MANAGING DIRECTOR & CEO * SEPT QUARTER NET PROFIT 1.72 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 914.2 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 10.33 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 6.83 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-AU Small Finance Bank Ltd Reports Rise in Sept Quarter Net Profit
description: BRIEF-AU Small Finance Bank Ltd Reports Rise in Sept Quarter Net Profit
